functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1,EntityTag:{Tags:[Sign,Acacia],Silent:1b,Size:0b,DeathLootTable:"item:item/magma_cube_spawn_egg/sign/trade",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,tag:{Data:{Text2:'{"translate":"取          引","color":"white","bold":true}',Text4:'{"text":"①","font":"sign","color":"white","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"function item:sign/click/trade"}}}'}}},{},{},{}]},display:{Name:'{"translate":"取引の印板","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"設置してクリックすると","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"以下の取引を自動で行ってくれる優れもの","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"取引内容 : 羊毛または砂利32個をｴﾒﾗﾙﾄﾞ1個と交換","color":"green","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"translate":"【注意】スポナーには直接設置できません！","color":"#FF0000","bold":true,"italic":false}']}}
